pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Ordinal Regression UTADIS // Implementation of Robust Ordinal Regression for multiple criteria value-based sorting with preference information provided in form of possibly imprecise assignment examples, assignment-based pairwise comparisons, and desired class cardinalities [Kadzinski et al. 2015, doi:10.1016/j.ejor.2014.09.050].
